definition.title: Crafting Perfect Interview Offers
definition.subtitle: Strategic offers turn podcast interviews into business opportunities. Based on your Authority Hook, these offers create a natural bridge from listener to prospect, allowing you to capture value from each interview appearance.
definition.content: A compelling offer clearly communicates the transformation you deliver, not just what you do. It speaks to your ideal client's pain points, presents a clear path to their desired outcome, and removes friction from taking the next step.

faq.question: What details should I include?
faq.answer: Include what the client gets, the transformation they'll experience, who it's best for, and what makes your approach unique.

faq.question: Should I include pricing?
faq.answer: That depends on your strategy. Some prefer to list prices upfront, while others prefer to qualify leads first. The generator works either way.

faq.question: How do I describe intangible benefits?
faq.answer: Focus on the feelings and outcomes - confidence, clarity, peace of mind. Quantify where possible (e.g., '10 hours saved per week').

faq.question: Can I generate multiple offer tiers?
faq.answer: Yes! Generate separate descriptions for each tier and arrange them as a pricing table in your media kit.

additionalGuidance.title: How to Mention Your Offer
additionalGuidance.content: When mentioning your offer during an interview, keep it concise and natural. Wait for the host to ask about your services or for a natural transition point. Frame your offer in terms of how it helps the listener, not what you're selling.

additionalGuidance.title: Tracking Offer Effectiveness
additionalGuidance.content: Create unique tracking links or coupon codes for each podcast appearance. This lets you measure which shows drive the most conversions and helps you prioritize future guesting opportunities.
